attributes.action: Show 3pm premier league games on a Saturday
attributes.additional_details: All premier league games should be televised for British people to watch their team play. It is near impossible to go to a premier league game and you can’t watch your own team play  at 3pm but yet all other national countries can. The English game should be available for English people before anyone else.
attributes.background: To encourage the FA and premier league to change the 3pm ban on games being televised in the uk

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about when to hold and broadcast football matches are a matter for the FA, the Premier League and the Football League, and broadcasters, not the Government or House of Commons.
